version_description:
Hi There

Thanks for your Feedback! On our newest update we included some nice feature and now you are able to import new Delay effects directly from BIAS Pedal. We have also improved the UI/UX of effect list.

Rock On!
Team Positive Grid

Hi There

Thanks for your Feedback! On this new update we support importing our newly released BIAS Modulation effect in BIAS Pedal. We also fixed some minor bugs, including logging into ToneCloud, restoring presets from Dropbox, and editing custom

Hi There

Thanks for your feedback. On our newest update we already fixed issues some you could experience before like high screech distortion problem when switching presets and noise problems with amps imported from BIAS Amp. We also fixed some som

Hi there,

In this update, we fixed possible crash issue when turning dual signal path on and changing preset, and other minor bugs to ensure system stability.

Rock on,
Team Positive Grid

Hi There,

Thanks for your feedback. On this update we fixed some issues of our previous version like the Pitch Shifter display problem, the S-Booster save preset with the chosen type problem and the BPM On / Off switch reversed bug in Ping Pong Del

Hi there,

In this update, we fix the bug importing BIAS Pedal stereo effects into BIAS FX and other minor bugs to improve stability.

Rock on,
Team Positive Grid

Hi there,

In this update we fixed Global EQ saving issue and some minor bugs in several effects.

Rock on,
Team Positive Grid

Hi there,

In this update, we fixed a bug that might lead to crash, and several UI display on meters in our compressor to make it works the same as the real thing. Thanks for all your suggestions and comments. We listen to all of them and react very

Hi there,

In this update we add MIDI support for imported items from BIAS Pedal, and also fixed some minor bugs.

Rock on,
Team Positive Grid

Hi there,

In this update, we are fully compatible with Audiobus 3, and fixed some minor issues to make sure its stability.

Rock on,
Team Positive Grid

Hi there,

Thanks for your feedback! In this new update, we've fixed crash issues when using Audiobus, as well as fixed several crash issues and reliability for ToneCloud connection.

Rock on,
Team Positive Grid

Hi There,

Thanks for your Feedback! On this new update we support importing our newly released BIAS Amp with reverb feature. We also fixed some minor bugs with iOS 11 integration.

Our Black Friday Promotion begins now, please check out: http

Hi there,

In this update, we fixed several minor bugs for better stability. If you have any issues using BIAS FX, please let us know!

Rock on,
Team Positive Grid

Hi there,

In this update, we integrated the latest preset version with desktop BIAS FX, which allows you to play your preset seamlessly everywhere.

Rock on,
Team Positive Grid

Thanks for your feedback! In this new update, we’ve updated the Audiobus SDK to 3.0.3.1 for compatibility improvements. We’ve also implemented some minor bug fixes in this update to improve the overall stability of the app.

Rock On!
Team Positiv

Hi there,

This update brings you the latest performance improvements and bug fixes that include:

- The BPM value can now be saved properly
- The EQ Compensation status can now be saved properly
- Combo Preamp and Stack Poweramp UI are

Hi there,

The latest update contains the following bug fixes:

- Balance controls (L/R) on Stereo Reverb Rack are no longer inverted
- MIX knob now works properly on the Ping-Pong Chorus Delay Pedal
- Q knob on Poly Octaver now works as

We are happy to announce the release of an upgraded version of BIAS FX guitar effects processing app that now works on both iPhone and iPad.

Now guitarists can turn their iOS devices into a world-class guitar amps and effects processor. The BIAS FX

We are happy to announce the release of an upgraded version of BIAS FX guitar effects processing app that now works on both iPhone and iPad.

Now guitarists can turn their iOS devices into a world-class guitar amps and effects processor. The BIAS FX

This quick update consists of the following bug fixes:

- "Upload to ToneCloud" window will now scale correctly when the keyboard display is opened (for iPhone devices)
- Global Output settings can now be saved properly (for iPhone devices)
-

In this latest update, we offer a new “All-In Bundle” for those of you that wish to get all the seven Expansion Packs at a discount price! Please go check it out at the in-app Store Page.

Improvements:
- We now add a “RESTORE PURCHASE” function under the SPECIAL OFFER tab at the in-app Store Page. BIAS FX Mobile previous owner now can restore all the features and purchased IAP in a t

This update consists of the following important changes:

Improvements:
- We have solved the latency issue between preset changes!
- BIAS FX Mobile Universal can now auto-detect and follow the sample rate from any audio interface. This can re

This update consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- BIAS FX Mobile Universal can now set up to 8 input channels! This can resolve instrument input channel issue with some audio interfaces.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed the random crash

This update consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- AMP menu is now re-arranged by categories. We also have added BIAS AMP category for all imported/edited custom amps from BIAS AMP 2.

Bug Fixes:

This update consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- We now add a Public Announcement system in our BIAS FX Mobile Universal app to make sure all of you get Positive Grid newest updates and promotions. For more info, please go to the “

Hi there!

In this update, we offer a new “Amp Arsenal Pack” for all guitar and bass players who desire to add more good sounding and versatile amps to their collection! (For more info, please go to the “Special Offer” in the in-app Store Page)
